com.github.mrm1st3r.cards

Class Cards

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.Cards

  • public class Cards
extends Application
    Application class that is used to hold bluetooth connections while activities are changed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lukas 'mrm1st3r' Taake
